name: Max Gravity
description: Max astronaut wakes up hungry and sleepy from stasis expecting arrival at his new home planet, only to find a wrecked spaceship floating in space. Together with the .. AI he plans to find as many survivors as possible and make his escape out of the UNSS New Horizons in this 2d-platformer adventure where the concept of gravity literally throws in a 180 degree twist on typical 2d platformers. Can you find out what happened?
